overview:
Melissa Fortune is CEO of Cohesion Marketing, a full service marketing firm specializing in technology. She has 13 years of experience within the marketing/tech industry as an web master, graphic designer, sales executive, entrepreneur, and CEO. Melissa is the founder of International Social Media Month and creator of socialHUE, the 1st (2011) Annual Global Green Women and Minorities Social Media Conference.

Mel, also known as Mel the Catalyst is host of the daily vignette radio show Simply Social Radio; News, Tips, Tools & Tricks curated daily to help you ‘Cut Through The Social Media Clutter’.

In 2004 she created the ecofriendly division of Cohesion Marketing, Cohesion Verde with the commitment to providing greater value to Cohesion customers by using resources more efficiently and by delivering new, sustainable solutions for customers needs. CohesionVerde.info offers users free resources to assist in their quest for becoming or staying Green; online directories, community calendars and more.

She is passionate about giving back to her community and she frequently volunteers her time and expertise with at risk youth as well as adults in need of her brand of assistance. Melissa is marketing chair of Ketchmore Kids Inc. a non profit dedicated to using music to direct positive growth in children and teens, a board member with Female Beatmakers, a platform used to help facilitate learning and development to women who are intrigued with the idea of doing male dominated roles within the music industry and is the marketing chair of MC Lyteâ€™s Hip Hop Sisters, a non profit created to promote personal growth through the women of Hip Hop.
